publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1142.1 Linda Fabiani: Planning and Telecommunications—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1142) in the name of Nora Radcliffe, insert after first "masts" "invites confirmation that the Executive’s proposals will also include full planning controls for major telecommunications development on existing buildings currently deemed to be permitted development;" Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon*, Robin Harper*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S1M-1142.1 Planning and Telecommunications (lodged on 19 September 2000) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1142.1 Linda Fabiani: Planning and Telecommunications—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1142) in the name of Nora Radcliffe, insert after first "masts" "invites confirmation that the Executive’s proposals will also include full planning controls for major telecommunications development on existing buildings currently deemed to be permitted development;" Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon, Robin Harper, Roseanna Cunningham, Tommy Sheridan

S1M-1142.1 Linda Fabiani: Planning and Telecommunications—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1142) in the name of Nora Radcliffe, insert after first "masts" "invites confirmation that the Executive’s proposals will also include full planning controls for major telecommunications development on existing buildings currently deemed to be permitted development;" Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon, Robin Harper, Roseanna Cunningham, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-1142.1 Planning and Telecommunications (lodged on 19 September 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1142.1 Planning and Telecommunications (lodged on 19 September 2000) Ms Sandra White*

S1M-1142.1 Linda Fabiani: Planning and Telecommunications—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1142) in the name of Nora Radcliffe, insert after first "masts" "invites confirmation that the Executive’s proposals will also include full planning controls for major telecommunications development on existing buildings currently deemed to be permitted development;" Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon, Robin Harper, Roseanna Cunningham, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Fiona McLeod*

S1M-1142.1 Linda Fabiani: Planning and Telecommunications—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1142) in the name of Nora Radcliffe, insert after first "masts" "invites confirmation that the Executive’s proposals will also include full planning controls for major telecommunications development on existing buildings currently deemed to be permitted development;" Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon, Robin Harper, Roseanna Cunningham, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Fiona McLeod
S1M-1142.1 Planning and Telecommunications (lodged on 19 September 2000) Mr Kenny MacAskill*

S1M-1142.1 Linda Fabiani: Planning and Telecommunications—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1142) in the name of Nora Radcliffe, insert after first "masts" "invites confirmation that the Executive’s proposals will also include full planning controls for major telecommunications development on existing buildings currently deemed to be permitted development;" Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon, Robin Harper, Roseanna Cunningham, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Fiona McLeod, Mr Kenny MacAskill
